content: {"locationId": "14190", "organizationId": "10982", "name": "Tabitha's Way Mobile Food Pantry", "address1": "608 W 1400 S", "address2": "", "city": "Payson", "state": "UT", "zipCode": "84651", "country": null, "phone": "801-709-8573", "phoneExt": "", "website": null, "latitude": "40.0230028", "longitude": "-111.7413314", "foodPrograms": "Mobile Pantry", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "English, Spanish", "features": "", "aboutUs": "The distribution site is on the North side of the building. We ask that everyone line up on the East side of the building until distribution is ready to start.   Someone will check you in and have you sign an iPad while you are waiting. Please have your trunks cleared out and open when the line starts to move as this is a drive-thru style mobile pantry.
